historical_summary: Xavier has been focusing on his career in blockchain technology, securing a role at a Web3 startup that uses AI Coding Assistants for smart contract development. He's been part of a project that leverages Blockchain-based Digital Identity for secure user verification in a decentralized app.

Xavier has been dating, exploring the vibrant city life, and sharing his experiences on social media. He's been using dating apps that incorporate Blockchain-based Digital Identity for secure user verification.
Regular conversations with his family about his tech career, with his parents showing keen interest in his work with AI and blockchain.
Xavier has been building his first professional network, attending local tech meetups, and participating in online blockchain forums.
Xavier has been curious about technology's immediate potential, focusing on practical applications of AI and blockchain in everyday life.
Xavier has become more aware of $XVI, participating in online discussions and exploring its connection to his life.
